name: emi.lb
description: The Logging and ookkeeping service (LB for short) was initially developed in the EU DataGrid project1 as a part of the Workload Management System (WMS). The development continued in the EGEE, EGEE- II and EGEE-III projects,2 where LB became an independent part of the gLite3 middleware, and then in the EMI Project.4
releaseNotes:
This bugfix release of LB improves InterLogger stability and fixes several issues relating to generated JSON output.

* For more details  Known Issues please read the Extended Release Notes
changeLog:
